typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ts as string,
		userId as string,
		sessionId as string,
		page as string,
		auth as string,
		method as string,
		status as string,
		level as string,
		itemInSession as string,
		location as string,
		lastName as string,
		firstName as string,
		registration as string,
		gender as string,
		artist as string,
		song as string,
		length as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ts,
		userId,
		sessionId,
		page,
		auth,
		method,
		status,
		level,
		itemInSession,
		location,
		lastName,
		firstName,
		registration,
		gender,
		artist,
		song,
		length
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(gender,
		level),
	countofsubtypebygender = count(),
		timestamp = first(timestamp)) ~> CountOfSubTypeByGender
Select1 select(mapColumn(
		ts,
		userId,
		sessionId,
		page,
		auth,
		method,
		status,
		level,
		itemInSession,
		location,
		lastName,
		firstName,
		registration,
		gender,
		artist,
		song,
		length
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OriginalData
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(location),
	SubsByLocation = count()) ~> SubsByLocation
OriginalData join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
